meanings.definition: The area along the shore of a bay.
meanings.sent1: The boats were docked along the baysides, ready for a day of fishing.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy picnicking on the baysides during sunny weekends.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls gathered on the baysides, hoping for a share of the picnic snacks.
meanings.sent4: The baysides whispered secrets to the waves, carrying stories of the sea.
meanings.sent5: Children built sandcastles on the baysides, their laughter filling the air.

meanings.definition: Located on or facing the side of a bay.
meanings.sent1: The cozy cottages offered stunning views of the baysides.
meanings.sent2: Tourists often choose hotels with balconies overlooking the baysides.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy town had a charming baysides cafe, perfect for watching sunsets.
meanings.sent4: The baysides houses stood proudly, painted in cheerful colors.
meanings.sent5: The baysides cliffs glowed golden in the evening light, a breathtaking sight.
